name: Gun jail Demo
description:
The Story Of The Game

A long time ago there were prisoners and they went to the prison by someone called Kenny he made that because he wanted a banana and he took the banana but the prisoners run away and took it so now Kenny is trying to get it back so download the game to complete the story

the Controllers

W A S D = Move

Space = Jump

Mouse = Move The Camera

Ctrl = Crouch

Left Mouse Button = Shot

The Game Made By Adef239

Special Thanks For Mohamed Magdy He Made The 3D Models But Not The Weapons And Make The Music But Not All Because I'm  Made 1 Song So I Want To Say For Him Thanks 

Oh I Forgot To Say    

Enjoy:)
